about_the_game:
All Abug! is an adventure in a larger than life setting. Embody a lizard with its caterpillar friend by its side in a cartoony environment as you seek asylum. Although seemingly dark, this game will make you blow some air out of your nose with its silly humour.

GOBBLE UP EVERYTHING ON YOUR PATH

From plants to enemies, use your super long lizard tongue to gobble up different resources at your disposal and use them to your advantage. Feed your caterpillar, destroy obstacles and grapple to new heights with your all-in-one tongue!

ESCORT A GIANT CATERPILLAR

In the face of danger, leave no insect behind. As your caterpillar friend advances along the path, remove obstacles that block its way and defend it from pesticide infected enemies that try to stop you. Feed it resources that cross your path to use its special abilities!

BOARD PASSENGERS

An unforgettable journey surrounded by insects with unique personalities seeking shelter from the apocalypse. After meeting at the stations, they will board your caterpillar and journey with you to safety, commenting about the events around them. Learn more about this larger than life world through the eyes of its citizens.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7, AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Faced with the threat of a wave of pesticides, embark on an expedition to save yourself from certain death. Gobble up obstacles on your path to allow your caterpillar to move along and board survivors who also seek asylum!
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
